content: ***this pattern is also available to view for free on my website *** **yarn ** * 912 yds lion brand pound of love or similar #4/worsted weight yarn - colorway antique white shown * 119 yds lion brand baby soft #3/dk yarn colorway sweetpea shown * feel free to substitute baby soft yarn with other worsted weight yarn or more pound of love finished size 30 in x 36 in this is an intermediate pattern
